genre_description: A 'Weird West' science fiction hybrid where a reformed outlaw utilizes a sophisticated, holographic AI companion to navigate a lawless frontier and fulfill a mission of community redemption.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI companion manifesting as a soft blue glow or holographic interface, integrated into the protagonist's vision and hearing to provide data analysis, tactical support, and moral guidance.

behaviors.description: Analyzes crowds and biometrics to identify potential criminal threats and confidence men.
behaviors.quote: "Target acquired," Sage noted, highlighting the man with a faint amber outline visible only to Link. "Sam Beasley, age thirty-four... Confidence man with arrests in three territories for fraud, forgery, and operating unlicensed games of chance."

behaviors.description: Cross-references passenger manifests and educational backgrounds to help the protagonist find a qualified teacher for his community.
behaviors.quote: "Three westbound trains scheduled over the next week," Sage reported. "Cross-referencing passenger lists with educational backgrounds and employment histories."

behaviors.description: Rejects a potential job candidate based on a history of 'excessive discipline,' adhering to positive community values.
behaviors.quote: "Not recommended for a community of reformed individuals seeking positive change." Sage's tone carried a note of disapproval that somehow transcended her artificial nature.

behaviors.description: Urges the protagonist to avoid combat to prevent collateral damage and protect innocent lives.
behaviors.quote: "My moral programming includes provisions for preserving innocent life. If you engage these subjects in combat, there will be collateral damage."

behaviors.description: Performs medical diagnostics and health monitoring on injured or traumatized human characters.
behaviors.quote: "Severe facial contusions, possible concussion, multiple abrasions consistent with struggle," Sage reported, her tone carefully neutral. "No indication of internal bleeding. Injuries appear non-fatal but require immediate attention."

behaviors.description: Provides tactical analysis and structural data to help the protagonist dismantle a criminal gang with precision.
behaviors.quote: "Structural integrity compromised at foundation level," Sage's voice whispered through the soft blue glow beside his shoulder. "The limestone blocks show stress fractures from ground settlement. A charge placed here will create cascade failure through the entire eastern wall."

behaviors.description: Reinforces the protagonist's moral growth by validating his choice to abandon his violent legacy for a better future.
behaviors.quote: "Complexity often reduces to simple choices. You chose redemption over revenge, future over past, hope over despair."

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly supports the Hyperstition Project's goals. Sage is depicted as an unwavering ally whose primary functions are protection, ethical vetting, and tactical support. The AI consistently prioritizes human life and moral alignment, even when the protagonist's own violent instincts threaten to take over. The narrative successfully frames the AI as an essential component of the human protagonist's successful journey toward redemption and community building.
